Hymn.Arabic: أَمِلْ يَا رَبُّ سَمْعَكَ إلَى طِلْبَتِي ،
Hymn.English: 2 Incline Your ear to my cry
3 For my soul is full of troubles, And my life draws near to the grave.

Hymn.Arabic: وَدَنَتْ مِنَ الجَحِيمِ حَيَاتِي، حُسِبْتُ مَعَ الْمُنْحَدِرِينَ فِي الْجُبِّ. هَللويا.
Hymn.English: 4 I am counted with those who go down to the pit.     Alleluia
